title: Ground floor 2x2 ready for immediate move in! Call today!!
posting_body: 1300 Eagle Ridge Dr S, Renton, WA, 98055
Floor plan Willow is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 850 Sq.
Residents at The Berkshire love living in a quiet community with serene surroundings.
Fall in love with the panoramic views of downtown Renton and Lake Washington.
Situated at the end of a road, The Berkshire Apartments is best defined by its mature, green landscaping surrounded by grassy & wooded hillsides, a creek, and views of both city and lake.
The relaxed community is filled with exclusive resident amenities.
Spend the afternoon lounging by one of the two outdoor swimming pools, or have a great soak after a long and stressful day in the open-air spa.
Enjoy time indoors, surfing the Internet while sipping coffee in our Wireless Internet Café.
The stunning one and two bedroom apartments in Renton, WA leave nothing to be desired.
Each floor plan features an open living and dining room along with spacious bedrooms.
The deluxe kitchens include modern and convenient appliances that include a dishwasher and a garbage disposal.
They are also finished with track lighting for a touch of elegance.
Nearly all homes feature a full-sized, stacked washer & dryer for your convenience and space-saving.
Each of these apartments for rent in Renton, WA includes a ceiling fan and spacious patio or balcony, where residents can invite a guest to enjoy a cool evening and take in the beautiful views.
The Berkshire is perfectly placed minutes from a variety of attractions with nearby shopping, entertainment, and restaurant options at Southcenter’s Westfield Mall and the Landing in Renton.
The property has convenient access to highways including 167, Interstate 405, Interstate 5 and Maple Valley Highway, with SeaTac Airport being just minutes away.
We offer a Preferred Employer Program for residents who work for specified government agencies as well as nearby businesses including Boeing, Paccar/Kenworth, and Valley Medical to name a few.
The Berkshire is a well-established, well-cared for, beautiful community that you would be proud to call home!
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
